data.meta_description: GCstar is an application for managing owned media collection. The application allows: managing defined or built-in (comic books, books, music, movies, software, games, board games, ...
data.text:
Cataloging

GCstar is an application for managing owned media collection. The application allows:

managing defined or built-in (comic books, books, music, movies, software, games, board games, numismatics, wines, small vehicles, cards, stamps, magazines, TV episodes or series) collections

searching and downloading information on your collections from the Internet (e.g. Amazon, Filmweb, GameSpot - services change according to the type of materials)

adding information about collected items (score, tags, information about loaning them to other people)

searching and filtering entries

shuffling selected entries if you can't decide (entry for the evening)

grouping elements of collection according to their parameters

importing lists of entries from Alexandria, Ant Movie Catalog (amc), DVDProfiler (xml), GCfilms (gcf), GCstar (gcs), Tellico (tc)

exporting materials to tar.gz, csv, gcs, html, Palm PDB, SQL, Tellico or xml
